video_info.title: How to Make Friends and Why Friendships Are Important | Podcast: Today I'm Growing By Growingannanas
video_info.description:
check out my podcast TODAY I'M GROWING üéôÔ∏èüíñ
https://www.buzzsprout.com/2221807/share

Hey Team! Welcome back to my podcast Today I'm Growing. I'm so excited to have you here!

In this episode, I‚Äôm talking about friendships and how they‚Äôve shaped my life‚Äîfrom childhood memories to how hard it can be to make new friends as an adult. I‚Äôll share my own story of how I let friendships fade and what I‚Äôm doing now to focus on the people who truly matter.

I‚Äôll also chat about recognizing real friendships, dealing with awkward social situations, and stepping out of your comfort zone to meet new people. 

Big hug, Anna xx üå∏
